Title: extractAllGroupsVertical
Description: Matches all groups of the haystack string using the pattern regular expression. Returns an array of arrays, where each array includes matching fragments from every group. Fragments are grouped in order of appearance in the haystack.

haystack — Input string. String.pattern — Regular expression with re2 regular expression syntax. Must contain groups, each group enclosed in parentheses. If pattern contains no groups, an exception is thrown. String.
Array of arrays of matches. Array.
NoteIf haystack does not match the pattern regex, an empty array is returned.
